name: Back to Bed (itch) (Junmoon, owokamii, CallMeZhiJian, SleePYR04, Jerry Ng, Ryuu.Ronin)
name_original: Back to Bed (itch) (Junmoon, owokamii, CallMeZhiJian, SleePYR04, Jerry Ng, Ryuu.Ronin)
description:
You play as a kid who woke up from bed by a man and got brought to another world that you don't recognize. Realizing that you are lost, you try to look for a way back home by navigating through all the mazes around you. Not knowing that something or someone is following you ...

Press W, A, S, D to walk.

It's a walking simulator. Nothing else
